definition: Croceine croaker (Pseudosciaena crocea), a fish popular in Cantonese cooking
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Is the province's yellow croaker preserved area.
sentences.chinese: 是省級的大黃魚自然保護區。

sentences.english: Sea travel resource is rich here, for example, it is the only spawning field of big yellow-fin tuna in the world.
sentences.chinese: 海洋旅遊資源十分豐富，是世界僅存的大黃魚產卵場。

sentences.english: The processing factory is for processing yellow croakers and producing fish food.
sentences.chinese: 加工廠主要進行大黃魚的深加工及魚食性飼料的生產。
